title: Dedication
sourceDesc: Butlerâ€™s <cite>Fifteeen Sermons Preached at the Rolls Chapel</cite> were first published in 1726. A second edition was produced in 1729, which included a new preface. A third edition of 1736 was simply a reprint of the second. A fourth edition of 1749 included six additional sermons preached on various occasions. This final edition is our copytext.

blocks.content:
To the Right Honourable

Sir Joseph Jekyll,

Master of the Rolls, &c.

The following Sermons, preached in his Chapel, are with all Humility Dedicated,
 BY
  his most dutiful, and
   most obedient Servant,
  Joseph Butler.

texts.title: Several Letters to the Reverend Dr. Clarke, from a Gentleman in Gloucestershire; with the Dr's Answers Thereunto
Fifteen Sermons Preached at the Rolls Chapel, to which are added Six Sermons Preached on Publick Occasions
